headline: eBay (EBAY) Valuation in Focus After Cautious Holiday Profit Outlook and Share Price Drop
summary: eBay (EBAY) shares tumbled after the company announced its latest quarterly results, highlighting solid Q3 performance but signaling a cautious profit outlook for the upcoming holiday quarter. Management cited macroeconomic challenges and policy changes impacting the business. See our latest analysis for eBay. This selloff snapped the strong momentum eBay had built up over 2025, with a sharp 15.6% drop in the past week after management’s cautious profit forecast unsettled investors. Even so,...

headline: Columbia Balanced Fund Q3 2025 Portfolio Update
summary: Electronic Arts' shares outperformed the broader market during the period, driven by renewed investor confidence and momentum surrounding several high-profile product announcements.
